Task Description: Investigation of the scope and discussion about the proposal with  Vermelho SA about potential common pricing with pertroluim industry.
Identification of various pertoluim companies collaborating to sell gas for a desired price. Assessment of  circumstances.
Antirtrust laws and regulations are reviewed. Market reports and industry dynamics are gathered and examined. Experts are questioned.
Preparing the complaint to show common pricing and parties involved. Describe the details of the antitrust action. Forward to corresponding court.
Negotiate with defendant and examine possible settlements. Seek damages caused to Vermelho SA and demand immediate termination of the common pricing.
Represent Vermelho SA in court and persuade court of Vermelho SA's interests by presenting clear evidence and violations of antitrust law.
Assist Vermelho SA in ensuring compliance with court's decision by the comanies which participated in the common pricing and are obliged to terminate such practices.
Monitor behavior of the companies involved in the common pricing to prevent future violations. Report suspicious innormalities immediately to court and inform Vermelho SA.
